Class DefaultBufferedImageBuilder

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
BufferedImageBuilder, ImageBuilder<BufferedImage>
@Named
public class DefaultBufferedImageBuilder
extends Object
implements BufferedImageBuilder

Default implementation of the image builder.

getImageBuilderConfig

@Nonnull
protected final ImageBuilderConfig getImageBuilderConfig()

Retrieve object for default configuration for image builders. If not used within Spring context a singleton instance of ImageBuilderConfigImpl will be used.

Returns:
config object for default settings
